Package net.nextinfinity.core.classes

Interface ClassManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoreClassManager

    public interface ClassManager
    The ClassManager object serves as a management interface for individual classes.
    It is created with the initialization of the game and should be accessed using Game#getClassManager.
    See Also:
    Game.getClassManager()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean deleteClass​(java.lang.String name)
      Deletes a class from memory and storage with the specified name.
      GameClass getClass​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the GameClass object with a specific name.
      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getClassSelector​()
      Gets the class selector item, which may be clicked to open the class selection menu.
      GameClass getRandomClass​(GamePlayer player)
      Scans classes in a random order for one the player has permission for.
      void loadClasses​()
      Loads classes from the classes.yml file, which is contained in the resources folder of the game.
      void openGUI​(GamePlayer player)
      Opens the class selection GUI for a specific entity.

    • Method Detail

      • loadClasses

        void loadClasses​()
        Loads classes from the classes.yml file, which is contained in the resources folder of the game.
        This method should only be called once.

      • openGUI

        void openGUI​(GamePlayer player)
        Opens the class selection GUI for a specific entity.
        Parameters:
        player - the GamePlayer object of the entity to open the GUI for

      • getClass

        GameClass getClass​(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the GameClass object with a specific name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the desired class
        Returns:
        the class with the specified name

      • deleteClass

        boolean deleteClass​(java.lang.String name)
        Deletes a class from memory and storage with the specified name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the class to delete
        Returns:
        true if the class exists and is deleted, false if no class is found

      • getRandomClass

        GameClass getRandomClass​(GamePlayer player)
        Scans classes in a random order for one the player has permission for.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to find a class for
        Returns:
        the GameClass found for the player, or null if no suitable class it found

      • getClassSelector

        org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getClassSelector​()
        Gets the class selector item, which may be clicked to open the class selection menu.
        Returns:
        the ItemStack of the class selector item
